traitList.name: Hustler
traitList.description:
I give it my all when it comes to 
what I want in life & have shown 
time & time again that I am a 
hustler. Whatever the issue is, I 
can trust myself to rise to the 
occasion & deliver no matter 
what the task at hand is.

traitList.name: Smooth Talker
traitList.description:
I am a very good-talker & can turn any conversation in my favour. 
I can literally hold a solid convo 
with anyone on the planet & I am 
very confident. I make the convo 
entertaining & fun, as well as 
beneficial.

traitList.name: Gamer
traitList.description:
I am smooth with girls & they are
attracted to my confidence. I am a
great texter & I am very good at 
bantering & flirting. Wherever I go, 
girls are attracted to me & I am the ladies favourite. I am also sexually smart.

traitList.name: Over-Achiever
traitList.description:
I always strive to be the best at 
whatever I choose to do in life. I'm 
very competitive & aim to make it 
to the top & be the top boy. I 
achieve great heights in life by
being persistent & never quitting. 
God wants me to win & things 
always turn out in my favour.

traitList.name: Alpha
traitList.description:
I am the alpha & show great 
leadership skills. People respect me & my presence is felt. I'm a 
man of value & people strive to be
like me. I'm outcome independent & win or lose, I stay in my frame.

traitList.name: Intelligent
traitList.description:
I am very smart in every situation 
in life. I have social intelligence as well as great decision-making 
skills. I always stay a step ahead & analyze situations smartly. I have great  IQ & see things others may not be able to right away.

traitList.name: Real
traitList.description:
I always do the right thing & keep 
it real. I am brutally honest. I 
remain loyal to those who are 
loyal to me. I always stay loyal to 
god & stay humble because god 
gave me everything I have today & without him I would be a nobody.

traitList.name: Fighter
traitList.description:
I am a great technical boxer with 
lot of skills. I am also a great 
wrestler with very good cardio. I 
have solid kicks too. I never give 
up in any area in life & look the 
challenge right in the eyes.

traitList.name: Charismatic
traitList.description:
My charisma is like a magnet & 
people are instantly drawn to me. Iradiate an amazing aura which 
makes people laugh & happy. I 
say the right things & make 
people curious.

traitList.name: Gifted
traitList.description:
In every area in life, if I truly put mymind into it, that area grows & I 
can master that skill. I am a quick 
learner & learn with an iterative 
process through failure. I have 
god-gifted talent to truly help me make it in life, it's up to me to use 
these abilities wisely.

traitList.name: Creative
traitList.description:
I am very innovative & get 
amazing ideas to improve my life. Iimprovise when needed & come 
up with creative solutions using 
my creative mechanism. God 
guides me & gives me unique & 
next level ideas to truly succeed inlife.
